summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the illegal sex industry; setting the amount of the fee imposed for pretrial diversion of a prostitution-related offense, the proceeds of which would be used for the care and treatment of the victims of the illegal sex industry; amending SMC 12A.10.070; providing for forfeiture of any monies paid as part of the alleged violation to be used to support investigation and arrest of those who patronize the illegal sex industry; and amending Ordinance 116666.
